page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN CROSSGATES
page.content:
The three main employers in our area are{the Royal Ordnance Factory}at{ Barnbow, the{Arndale Centre,}and the{ {Government Offices}on the Ring Road.
{The factory at Barnbow}was built during the First World War to manufacture armaments. Nowadays the factory employs about 1400 people largly making tanks such as the Cheiftain.The workforce mainly work a five day week starting at 7.30a.m. They are not allowed to say how many tanks are made each week.The factory is soon to be privatised.
The{Arndale Centre}is mainly shops and contains many well known chains such as Woolworth's and Boot's, as well as smaller businesses.
